item.title: By: yunk
item.dc:creator: yunk
item.description:
I think the best solution writing a "dear john" letter about getting redeployed and having to quit, or better that "her" family is from the old country and she's being forced to marry her uncle and he doesn't like MMOs. Then delete the character. Something to give him fond memories of what could have been.
Maybe it's all in his head, you know how we guys think every women we meet are interested in us? I mean he said he only knew the guy for a couple hours, did the other guy let him have a drop off a mob and now he thinks that means something?
Of course, he posted about his predicament with his main? Huh?
I finally got so sick of the wierdos on my female toons I put "I'm a guy IRL" in my descriptions in games like CoX.
item.content:encoded:
I think the best solution writing a “dear john” letter about getting redeployed and having to quit, or better that “her” family is from the old country and she’s being forced to marry her uncle and he doesn’t like MMOs. Then delete the character. Something to give him fond memories of what could have been.

Maybe it’s all in his head, you know how we guys think every women we meet are interested in us? I mean he said he only knew the guy for a couple hours, did the other guy let him have a drop off a mob and now he thinks that means something?

Of course, he posted about his predicament with his main? Huh?

I finally got so sick of the wierdos on my female toons I put “I’m a guy IRL” in my descriptions in games like CoX.

item.title: By: Rick
item.dc:creator: Rick
item.description:
Ok, so you messed up and lied to a guy about being a girl (and probably lied to yourself about a couple things in the process), but your real error is posting about it on the freaking WoW forums.
If you need a sympathetic audience for thoughtful and helpful advice about your stupid predicament, maybe Oprah has forums on her website. Until then, delete the toon and STFU about the whole affair, that's my advice.
item.content:encoded:
Ok, so you messed up and lied to a guy about being a girl (and probably lied to yourself about a couple things in the process), but your real error is posting about it on the freaking WoW forums.

If you need a sympathetic audience for thoughtful and helpful advice about your stupid predicament, maybe Oprah has forums on her website. Until then, delete the toon and STFU about the whole affair, that’s my advice.

item.title: By: Legolas
item.dc:creator: Legolas
item.content:encoded:
“I’ve never been in a relationship, real nor online, so I have no experience whatsoever with this.”

Just kind of says it all.

At least he hasn’t developed an unhealthy relationship with his female toon and himself. There appears to be some hope he’ll find sunlight someday.

item.title: By: Anon
item.dc:creator: Anon
item.description:
Ha ha ha haaa!
Foton, please tell me you've already read the Art of Warcraft on SomethingAwful - it's over here: http://www.somethingawful.com/d/art-of-warcraft/index.php
There are some very sad and lonely young men playing this game.
item.content:encoded:
Ha ha ha haaa!

Foton, please tell me you’ve already read the Art of Warcraft on SomethingAwful – it’s over here: http://www.somethingawful.com/d/art-of-warcraft/index.php

There are some very sad and lonely young men playing this game.

item.title: By: Heather
item.dc:creator: Heather
item.description: Oh, and I hate to say it Foton, but I think it's your guild with the divorces. Jeez, man. I've never seen an IRL marriage implode in-game before, and I've gamed with quite a few married folks!
item.content:encoded: Oh, and I hate to say it Foton, but I think it’s your guild with the divorces. Jeez, man. I’ve never seen an IRL marriage implode in-game before, and I’ve gamed with quite a few married folks!

item.title: By: Heather
item.dc:creator: Heather
item.description:
*blink,blink*
What I want to know is, why is his first thought, "How do I keep up this charade without him finding out I'm a guy?" I mean, really, that's what his questions boil down to. I'd think MY first thought---assuming I was dumb enough to get into that kind of situation, which I'd like to think would be pretty damn small, I mean it's pretty hard to ACCIDENTALLY get into a relationship---would be, "How do I get my ass out of this?!"
item.content:encoded:
*blink,blink*

What I want to know is, why is his first thought, “How do I keep up this charade without him finding out I’m a guy?” I mean, really, that’s what his questions boil down to. I’d think MY first thought—assuming I was dumb enough to get into that kind of situation, which I’d like to think would be pretty damn small, I mean it’s pretty hard to ACCIDENTALLY get into a relationship—would be, “How do I get my ass out of this?!”

item.title: By: Aufero
item.dc:creator: Aufero
item.description: I've played half a dozen female toons, and I don't think one thing has ever led to another. Apparently I'm doing it wrong.
item.content:encoded: I’ve played half a dozen female toons, and I don’t think one thing has ever led to another. Apparently I’m doing it wrong.

item.title: By: blachawk
item.dc:creator: blachawk
item.description: And I thought Dentarg had it bad population-wise.
item.content:encoded: And I thought Dentarg had it bad population-wise.

item.title: By: BigFreak
item.dc:creator: BigFreak
item.description:
One thing leading to another sounds a bit too steamy for an MMO. Vent cyber?
I'm surprised things like this still happen. e-boy/girlfriends are so '99. What?
item.content:encoded:
One thing leading to another sounds a bit too steamy for an MMO. Vent cyber?

I’m surprised things like this still happen. e-boy/girlfriends are so ’99. What?
